import styled from "styled-components" import { Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableHead, TableRow, TableSortLabel } from '@material-ui/core' import StripeContainer from "./StripeContainer" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState } from "react" import Modal from 'react-modal'; import '../index.css' const ShoppingCart = () => { const [modalIsOpen, setModalIsOpen] = useState(false) const setModalIsOpenToTrue = () => { setModalIsOpen(true) } const setModalIsOpenToFalse = () => { setModalIsOpen(false) } return ( Shopping Cart Your Items PRICE Quantity Total 2018 HELLO Remove 100€ Update €100
setModalIsOpen(false)}> x ) } const customStyles = { content: { top: '15%', left: '40px', right: 'auto', bottom: 'auto', marginRight: '-50%', // transform: 'translate(-50%, -50%)', backgroundColor: '#fff', border: 'none', borderRadius: '5px', boxShadow: '0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)' } } const Container = styled.div` width: 60%; margin: 100px auto; ` const ButtonClose = styled.button` width: 60%; margin: 100px auto; ` const Img = styled.img` width: 20px; ` const WrapperTitle = styled.div`` const TitleCart = styled.h1` margin-bottom: 20px; ` const WrapperTable = styled.div`` const WrapperCart = styled.div` ` const InfoItems = styled.div`` const Date = styled.span`` const Title = styled.span`` const ButtonRemove = styled.button`` const Input = styled.input`` const UpdateButton = styled.button`` const InfoQuantity = styled.div`` export default ShoppingCart
